snippet: The family of Sarah Jones, who was killed on the set of the indie film “Midnight Rider,” said it dropped Gregg Allman as a defendant in a wrongful-death suit.
abstract: Family of Sarah Jones, crew member who was killed by a freight train during filming of movie Midnight Rider, drop executive producers Gregg Allman and Michael Lehman and distributor Open Road from wrongful-death lawsuit.
lead_paragraph: The family of Sarah Jones, who was killed on the set of the indie film “Midnight Rider,” said it dropped Gregg Allman as a defendant in a wrongful-death suit.

headline.print_headline: Gregg Allman Dropped From Wrongful-Death Suit
headline.main: Gregg Allman Dropped From Wrongful-Death Suit
